Activity: Check emails. Read a few articles about artificial intelligence in healthcare.
Review the project plan for the week. Ensure all tasks have been completed and documented appropriately.
Prepare a summary report of the week's activities, including the progress made on each task, any challenges encountered, and the next steps. Send to @ITPM-1.
Meet with @ITPM-1 to discuss the weekly summary report and review the overall progress of the project. TOPIC: Weekly Project Status Review
Lunch Break. Socialize with colleagues in the break room.

Begin drafting a communication to be sent to all clinical staff, data entry personnel, etc. regarding the new process for data quality reporting and the importance of accurate data for the influenza trend analysis. Work with @Clinlead-1 on this.
Collaborate with @Trainer-1 to finalize the training materials for reporting data quality issues. Review these one last time. TOPIC: Final Review of Training Materials

Explore options for monitoring the effectiveness of the data quality reporting process. Consider tracking the number of reported issues, the types of issues reported, and the time taken to resolve the issues.
Wrap up the week by organizing files, cleaning up workspace (both physical and digital), and reflecting on the week's accomplishments and areas for improvement. Browse interesting papers on ArXiv.
